title: Samsung Odyssey G8 UWQHD 175Hz FreeSync OLED Curved 34in Monitor
description: The Samsung Odyssey G8 UWQHD 175Hz FreeSync OLED Curved monitor features a 34inch display with a 3440 x 1440 max resolution.

title: PCCG Phaser 4080 Gaming PC
description: Intel Core i9 13900KF CPU cooled by the MSI MAG CORELIQUID C360 AIO Liquid Cooler.

title: Gigabyte GeForce RTX 4090 Aorus Xtreme Waterforce 24GB
description: The Gigabyte GeForce RTX 4090 Aorus Xtreme Waterforce 24GB graphics card features 24GB GDDR6X 384-bit memory interface.

title: Corsair Vengeance RGB 32GB (2x16GB) 6400MHz CL32 DDR5
description: Corsair Vengeance RGB 32GB (2x16GB) 6400MHz CL32 DDR5 memory delivers DDR5 performance.

title: Team Vulcan Z 2.5inch SATA SSD 1TB
description: The Team Vulcan Z SATA SSD 1TB features a sequential read and write speed of 550/500 MB/s, 800TBW.

title: PCCG Pulse 3060 Gaming PC
description: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 CPU with Wraith Spire cooler, ASUS TUF B450M II Pro Gaming Motherboard, ASUS GeForce RTX 3060 Dual OC 8GB graphics card.

title: AMD Ryzen 9 7900X3D Processor
description: The AMD Ryzen 9 7900X3D CPU makes gaming more enjoyable than ever thanks to the combination of an incredibly fast processor and AMD 3D V-Cache Technology

title: ASUS ROG Falchion RGB Compact Wireless Mech Keyboard Red Switch
description: The ASUS ROG Falchion RGB Compact Wireless Mech Keyboard Red Switch is a compact 65% layout keyboard in a 60% frame.
